title: Cristiano Ronaldo's girlfriend Georgina Rodriguez is named as latest PrettyLittleThing ambassador
text:
Cristiano Ronaldo's girlfriend Georgina Rodriguez has become the latest ambassador for online fashion giant PrettyLittleThing.

The former shop assistant, 25, who has been dating the football ace, 34, since 2016, looked phenomenal in new campaign shots as the partnership was announced.

She joins a legion of stars in collaborating with the Manchester-based business, including Ashanti, Kourtney Kardashian, Saweetie and Molly -Mae Hague.

Cheeky! Cristiano Ronaldo's girlfriend Georgina Rodriguez has become the latest ambassador for online fashion giant PrettyLittleThing

Georgina looked sensational for the shoot as she displayed her killer curves in a barely-there mini dress with a halterneck top and sky-high hemline.

Another skin-tight mini dress showed off every line of her frame, with a ruffled hemline adding a flirty feel alongside the puffball sleeves.

One of the sexiest looks in the collection was a racy lace mini with a keyhole cut out at the chest to best exhibit her eye-popping cleavage.

Last month, Cristiano revealed he plans to marry Georgina in a sweet profession of his love for the stunner in words that will no doubt delight the star.

A vision: The former shop assistant, 25, who has been dating the football ace, 34, since 2016, looked phenomenal in new campaign shoots as the partnership was announced

The football ace and the stunner have been dating since 2016 and it seems he is very confident in their union as he made the gushing vow - which he insists would be his mother Maria Dolores dos Santos Aveiro's dream.

Speaking to Piers Morgan, he said: 'She helped me so much. Of course I’m in love with her. We’ll be (married) one day, for sure. It’s my mum’s dream as well.'

Georgina has inserted herself smoothly into life with Cristiano and his children Cristiano Jr., nine, two-year-old twins Eva and Mateo, and Alana, 22 months.

Smouldering: She was showing off her incredible figure for the sexy shoot

Their love is plain to see, as he said: 'She helped me so much. Of course I’m in love with her. We’ll be (married) one day, for sure. It’s my mum’s dream as well...

'So, one day. Why not? It’s great. She’s my friend. We have conversations. I open the heart for her and she opens the heart for me.’

Despite his exciting profession, Georgina recently admitted that it's 'not easy' being in a relationship with someone as famous as him - but she wouldn't change a thing.

Happy days: Last month, Cristiano revealed he plans to marry Georgina in a sweet profession of his love for the stunner in words that will no doubt delight the star

The former shop assistant confessed that it was 'love at first sight' when they first met and also revealed how she seduces her footballer beau.

Speaking to The Sun on Sunday, Georgina opened up on her relationship and confessed that although at times it can be tough dating someone in the public eye, she couldn't be happier.

She said: 'Being the partner of someone so famous is not easy but I would not change it for the world.'
